name: Junior Rules (Rule Card)
text:
RULES:
? No Hand size limit.
? Level 5+ monsters must be Normal Summoned/Set without Tribute(s), unless required for its Normal Summon or the card says "You can Tribute Summon this card" in its effect text.
? Ignition Effects of the turn player's monsters can be activated on Summon.
? You can only attempt to 1 activate Spell/Trap per turn.
? You can only Set 1 Spell/Trap per turn.
? Only 1 Field Spell can be active. If another Field Spell is Set or activated, send the previous one to the GY.
